pageContext.claim: “The World Health Organization should be ashamed of themselves, because they're like the public relations agency for China. And this country pays them almost $500 million a year, and China pays them $38 million a year.”
pageContext.analysis: As of the end of 2019, China contributed $86 million to WHO — $75.8 million in assessed contributions and $10.2 million in voluntary contributions — while the U.S. gave $893 million — $236 million in assessed contributions and $656 million in voluntary contributions. WHO praised China's handling of the coronavirus at the start -- but so did Trump, repeatedly.
